attributes.review: i downloaded this app hoping for something good. instead, donald trump himself greeted me and made my phone overheat with this laggy, unpolished interface. he advised me to give it one star, but only if i voted for him in this election. little does he know, i am a convicted felon and i lost my rights due to several accounts of tax fraud and arson. finally, the laws are in my favor. donald trump told me that he would haunt me now after his inevitable heart attack. ive been damned. 0/10 i dont want a spraytanned ghost bobbing around
